entry.string: An error occurred while processing your request. The details are:
entry.translation: Terjadi error saat memproses permintaan Anda. Detilnya sebagai berikut:

entry.string: Last updated on #(1)
Database error while executing: '#(1)'; error description is: '#(2)'.
entry.translation: Error database saat mengeksekusi : '#(1)'; deskripsi error adalah: '#(2)'.

entry.string: Default message
Block type already exists
An attempt was made to register a block type in a module that already exists.
entry.translation: Usaha untuk mendaftarkan jenis blok dalam modul yang sudah ada.

entry.string: Bad Data
The data provided was bad.
The value provided during this operation could not be validated, or was not accepted for other reasons.
entry.translation: Nilai yang disediakan selama proses ini tidak bisa divalidasi, atau tidak dapat diterima untuk alasan yang lain.

entry.string: File does not exist
An operation requires a file that cannot be found.
entry.translation: Operasi membutuhkan file yang tidak ditemukan.

entry.string: The file may be missing, or its name may have changed.
entry.translation: File mungkin hilang atau namanya berubah.

entry.string: Operation Halted
This operation cannot be completed under the present circumstances.
entry.translation: Operasi tidak dapat diselesaikan dalam keadaan sekarang.

entry.string: This operation was stopped because, although it is not forbidden, it cannot be completed in this context.
entry.translation: Operasi ini dihentikan karena, walaupun tidak dilarang, tidak dapat diselesaikan dalam konteks ini.

entry.string: Duplicate Data
The data provided was a duplicate.
A unique value was expected during this operation, but the value provided is a duplicate of an existing value.
entry.translation: Sebuah nilai unik diharapkan selama operasi ini, tetapi nilai yang diberikan kembar dengan nilai yang sudah ada.

entry.string: Forbidden Operation
The operation you are attempting is not allowed in the current circumstances.
entry.translation: Operasi yang Anda coba tidak diijinkan dalam keadaan sekarang.

entry.string: You may have clicked on the browser's back or refresh button and reattempted an operation that may not be repeated, or your browser may not have cookies enabled.
entry.translation: Anda mungkin meng-klik tombol "refresh" atau "back" browser dan mencoba lagi operasi yang tidak boleh diulang.

entry.string: Login error
A problem was encountered during the login process.
No further information is available.
Missing Data
The data is incomplete.
A value was expected during this operation, but none was found.
entry.translation: Sebuah nilai yang diharapkan selama operasi ini, tetapi tidak ditemukan.

entry.string: Multiple instances
A module contains more than one instance of the same block type.
entry.translation: Modul berisi lebih dari satu instan dari jenis blok yang sama.

entry.string: Privileges Error
You do not have privileges for this operation.
entry.translation: Anda tidak mempunyai hak akses untuk operasi ini.

entry.string: The operation you are attempting requires privileges that you do not have. Contact the systems/site administrator to request access.
entry.translation: Operasi yang Anda coba membutuhkan hak akses yang Anda tidak memilikinya. Silahkan hubungi administrator situs/sistem untuk meminta hak akses.

entry.string: Not logged in
You are attempting an operation that is not allowed for the Anonymous user.
entry.translation: Anda mencoba melakukan operasi yang tidak diperbolehkan untuk pengguna Anonymous

entry.string: An operation was encountered that requires the user to be logged in. If you are currently logged in please report this as a bug.
Item not found
An unexpected empty result occurred.
entry.translation: Sebuah hasil kosong yang tidak diharapkan terjadi.

entry.string: An operation that should have returned a result instead came up empty.
entry.translation: Operasi harus menghasilkan kembalian daripada kosong

entry.string: Wrong version
The application version supplied is wrong.
No further information available
entry.translation: Tidak ada informasi detil yang tersedia

entry.string: Assertion in code failed
An assertion evaluated to false, which indicates a coding error.
entry.translation: Penegasan (assertion) dievaluasi ke saah (false), yang mengindikasikan error pengkodean.

entry.string: While executing, an asserted condition failed. This means that a definite error in some code exists.
entry.translation: Ketika mengeksekusi, kondisi penegasan gagal. Ini berarti ada error tertentu dalam kode yang ada.

entry.string: Bad Parameter
A parameter encountered was bad.
A parameter provided during this operation could not be validated, or was not accepted for other reasons.
entry.translation: Parameter yang disediakan selama operasi ini tidak dapat divalidasi, atau tidak diterima karena alasan lain.

entry.string: Compiler error
The Blocklayout compiler encountered an error.
The Blocklayout compiler encountered an error it could not recover from. No specific information is available.
Xaraya is not properly configured
The combination of configuration settings has led to a conflict
Xaraya is configured with some settings which lead to a conflicting situation. Some configuration settings cannot be used simultaneously
Context does not exist
A context element was not found.
This error is a catchall to describe situations where a context element (block, template, include) was expected but not found.
Database Error
An error was encountered while attempting a database operation.
entry.translation: Error ditemukan ketika mencoba operasi database.

entry.string: Database Query Error
An error was encountered while trying to execute a database query.
entry.translation: Error ditemukan ketika mencoba mengeksekusi queri database

entry.string: A database query could not be executed, either because the query could not be understood or because it returned unexpected results.
Deprecated API
A function call encountered belongs to a deprecated API.
A function call encountered belongs to an old API and is therefore no longer supported.
Deprecated Blocklayout Attribute
A tag in a template contains a deprecated attribute.
entry.translation: Tag dalam template berisi atribut yang tercela.

entry.string: A tag in a template contains a deprecated attribute and needs to be replaced by a new one, or be left out, see BL documentation for the right syntax.
PHP: Fatal Error
A system error was received from the PHP interpreter.
entry.translation: Error sistem dikirim dari interpreter PHP.

entry.string: There is an error in the PHP code that is being processed.
entry.translation: Ada error dalam kode PHP yang sedang diproses.

entry.string: PHP: Warning
PHP: Parse Error
PHP: Error Notice
PHP: Core Error
PHP: Core Warning
PHP: Compile Error
PHP: Compile Warning
PHP: User Error
PHP: User Warning
User Notice
Empty Parameter
A parameter value was not provided.
A parameter was expected during this operation, but none was found.
entry.translation: Parameter diperlukan selama operasi ini, tetapi tidak ditemukan.

entry.string: Event is not registered
An unknown event was encountered.
A reference to an event was encountered that is unknown to the system.
Unknown system error
An unknown system error was encountered.
The error system has encountered an error it cannot identify. Please help us correct this by filing a bug at bugs.xaraya.com.
entry.translation: Error System menemukan kesalahan yang tidak bisa diidentifikasi. Mohon bantu kami untuk memperbaiki ini dengan mengisi bug di bugs.xaraya.com

entry.string: Function failed
A call to a function returned a bad result.
entry.translation: Pemanggilan ke fungsi mengembalikan hasil buruk.

entry.string: The function executed correctly, but the result was a failure.
entry.translation: Fungsi dieksekusi dengan benar, tetapi hasilnya rusak.

entry.string: Unknown ID
An expected ID was not found.
An item was requested by an ID that is not recognized. This could mean the item has been moved, changed, or does not exist.
Invalid attribute
The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid attribute.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi atribut tidak sah.

entry.string: Invalid entity
The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid entity.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi entitas tidak sah.

entry.string: Invalid file
The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid file.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi file tidak sah.

entry.string: The file was either not found, or could not be read properly.
Invalid instruction
The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid instruction.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi instruksi tidak sah.

entry.string: Invalid special variable
The Blocklayout parser encountered a problem with a special variable.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi masalah dengan variabel khusus.

entry.string: Invalid syntax
The Blocklayout parser encountered a syntax error.
Invalid tag
The Blocklayout parser encountered an invalid tag.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi tag tidak sah.

entry.string: The tag encountered does not conform to XML syntax.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout menghadapi ketidak-cocokan ke sintaks XML

entry.string: Locale not available
Locale does not exist
An unknown locale was encountered.
A reference to a locale was encountered that is unknown to the system.
Missing attribute
The Blocklayout parser could not find a tag attribute.
entry.translation: Parser Blocklayout tidak menemukan atribut tag.

entry.string: A tag attribute required by syntax was not found.
entry.translation: Atribut tag yang dibutuhkan oleh sintaks tidak ditemukan.

entry.string: Missing parameter
The Blocklayout parser could not resolve a tag parameter.
A tag parameter could not be resolved because of bad syntax.
Module Dependency
A module call failed because of an unsatisifed dependency.
The current module cannot execute because another module that must first be installed is not present.
Module file does not exist
An operation requires a module file that cannot be found.
The file may be missing, or its name may have changed. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
Module function does not exist
A call has been made to a module function that cannot be found.

The file in which the function was expected may be missing. If not, then the error may have occurred because the actual function has a different name, or does not exist. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
Module is not active
A call has been made to a module that is not active.
A module was called that has not yet been activated/installed. Use the activate link in the modules module (Modules->ViewAll) to install modules.
Module does not exist
A call has been made to a module that cannot be found

A module was called that has not yet been installed or is not present. Use the activate link in the modules module (Modules->ViewAll) to install modules. Note: this error sometimes also occurs when a file cannot be parsed because of PHP errors.
No Privilege
You do not have the privileges for this operation.
entry.translation: Anda tidak mempunyai hak akses untuk operasi ini.

entry.string: An operation was attempted for which your user has not been assigned privileges. Privileges must be assigned by the system administrator(s).
Not implemented
The requested feature is not available.
A request was made to access a feature that is not available in this installation. The feature is either missing or unavailable in the current version of Xaraya.
System error
A system error was encountered.
Template does not exist
An unknown template name was encountered.
An attempt was made to render a template that was not found. The template may have been removed or does not exist, or its name may have changed.
Theme does not exist
An unknown theme name was encountered.
An attempt was made to display a theme that was not found. The theme may have been removed or does not exist, or its name may have changed.
Unable to load
An error was encountered during a load operation.
The system was unable to successfully load a component, such as a module or theme.
Unknown Error
An unknown error was encountered.
Variable is not registered
You are attempting to call a variable that the system does not recognize.
An error was encountered during a call to a variable. The variable may have been removed, or its name changed.
XML Parser Error
The XML parser has encountered an error.
The XML parser tried to execute a line that was not well formed.
entry.translation: Parser XML mencoba mengeksekusi baris yang bentuknya tidak baik.

entry.string: The site is locked
No access at this time
Empty database_name.
Unknown database type: '#(1)'.
Empty tableName.
Not array fields.
Invalid args (must be an array, command key must be set).
entry.translation: args tidak valid (harus array, kunci perintah [command key] harus ditetapkan).

entry.string: Invalid index (must be an array, fields key must be an array, name key must be set).
entry.translation: Indeks tidak sah (harus array, kunci field/fields key harus array, kunci nama/name key harus ditetapkan.

entry.string: Invalid args (field key must be set).
entry.translation: args tidak valid (kunci field/field key harus ditetapkan).

entry.string: Invalid args (type,size,default,null, unsigned, increment, or primary_key must be set)
entry.translation: Invalid args (type,size,default,null, unsigned, increment, atau primary_key harus ditetapkan)

entry.string: Invalid args (new_name key must be set.)
entry.translation: args tidak valid (kunci new_name harus ditetapkan).

entry.string: Unknown command: '#(1)'.
Modify does not currently support: type, size, default, unsigned, increment, or primary_key)
entry.translation: Modifikasi saat ini belum didukung: type, size, default, unsigned, increment atau primary_key

entry.string: Invalid #(1) for function #(2)() in #(3)
No validation type present.
The #(1) type '#(2)' could not be found.
Variable #(1) is not an array: "#(2)"
Not an array: "#(1)"
Array variable has less elements "#(1)" than the specified minimum "#(2)"
Array variable has more elements "#(1)" than the specified maximum "#(2)"
Variable #(1) is not a boolean: "#(2)"
Not a boolean: "#(1)"
Variable #(1) is not a checkbox: "#(2)"
Not a scheckbox: "#(1)"
Variable #(1) does not match an e-mail type: "#(2)"
Not an e-mail type: "#(1)"
Input "#(1)" was not one of the possibilities for #(2): "
Input "#(1)" was not one of the possibilities.
Variable #(1) is not a float type: "#(2)"
Not a float type: "#(1)"
Float Value "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
Float Value "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
Variable #(1) contains a tag not allowed: "#(2)"
Not an allowed tag: "#(1)"
Attributes are not allowed for this tag in variable #(1): "#(2)"
Variable #(1) is not an integer: "#(2)"
Not an integer: "#(1)"
Integer Value "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
Integer Value "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
The variable is not set!
Invalid e-mail #(1), the mail server doesnt recognize it.
Unable to connect to the mail server #(1) for e-mail #(2).
Variable #(1) should not be empty: "#(2)"
Should not be empty: "#(1)"
There is no parameter to check against in the Regexp validation of #(1)
There is no parameter to check against in the Regexp validation
Variable #(1): "#(2)" did not match pattern "#(3)"
Variable #(1) is not a string: "#(2)"
Not a string: "#(1)"
Size of the string "#(1)" is smaller than the specified minimum "#(2)"
Size of the string "#(1)" is bigger than the specified maximum "#(2)"
This call needs to be removed
The directories under #(1) must be writeable by PHP.
Context type: #(1) and file name: #(2)
Module or Theme Name #(1) is empty.
Empty RegId (#(1)) or RegId is equal to 0.
Unknown
This module is not installed properly. Not all info could be retrieved
Unable to find Base Info for Module: #(1)
entry.translation: Tidak dapat mencari Info Dasar (Base Info) untuk Modul: #(1)

entry.string: Module Name #(1) is empty.
Could not load function file: [#(1)].
Error Caught:
Module function #(1) does not exist.

Could not load function file: [#(1)].

 Error Caught:
 #(2)
entry.translation:
Tidak dapat memuat file fungsi : [#(1)].

 Error Caught:
 #(2)

entry.string: Module API function #(1) does not exist or could not be loaded.
entry.translation: Fungsi API modul #(1) tidak ditemukan atau tidak dapat dimuat.

entry.string: Empty Module or Theme Name (#(1)).
Directory information #(1) is empty.
Cannot open file #(1).
Wrong type, it must be 'module' or 'theme': #(1).
Empty theme or module name (#(1)).
Empty Theme or Module variable name (#(1)).
entry.translation: Nama variabel Theme atau Modul (#(1)) kosong.

entry.string: Illegal attribute name ('#(1)'): Attribute name may contain letters, numbers, _ and -, and must start with a letter.
Illegal attribute flags ('#(1)'): flags must be of integer type.
entry.translation: Flag atribut ('#(1)') tidak legal: flag harus bertipe integer.

entry.string: Illegal tag definition: '#(1)' is an invalid tag name.
entry.translation: Defisi tag tidak legal: '#(1)' merupakan nama tag yang tidak sah.

entry.string: Illegal tag definition: '#(1)' is an invalid handler.
entry.translation: Defisi tag tidak legal: '#(1)' merupakan handler yang tidak sah.

entry.string: Illegal tag registration flags ('#(1)'): flags must be of integer type.
entry.translation: Flag registrasi tag ('#(1)') tidak legal: flag harus bertipe integer.

entry.string: <xar:#(1)> tag is already defined.
<xar:#(1)> tag is not defined.
'#(1)' attribute in <xar:#(2)> tag does not have correct type. See tag documentation.
entry.translation: Atribut '#(1)' dalam tag <xar:#(2)> tidak mempunyai tipe yang benar. Lihat dokumentasi tag.

entry.string: Required '#(1)' attribute is missing from <xar:#(2)> tag. See tag documentation.
entry.translation: Atribut '#(1)' yang dibutukan hilang dari tag <xar:#(2)>. Lihat dokumentasi tag.

entry.string: Empty themeName (#(1)).
#(1) css stylesheet file cannot be found at this location:
entry.translation: File stylesheet CSS #(1) tidak ditemukan dilokasi ini:

entry.string: #(1) (no valid scope attribute could be deduced from this xar:style tag)
Anonymous
No Information
User identified by uid #(1) does not exist.
entry.translation: User yang diidentifikasikan dengan uid #(1) tidak ditemukan

entry.string: User variable #(1) was not correctly registered
entry.translation: Variabel user #(1) tak terdaftar dengan benar

entry.string: Security Realm #(1) - Component #(2) - Instance #(3) - Level #(4) : This call needs to be converted to the Xaraya security system
Parameters to winnow need to be arrays
Did not find mask #(1) registered for an unspecified component in module #(2)
Did not find mask #(1) registered for component #(2) in module #(3)
No privilege for #(1)
A query is missing in component #(1) of module #(2)
entry.translation: Queri hilang dalam komponen #(1) dari modul #(2)

entry.string: #(1) and #(2) do not have the same instances. #(3) | #(4) | #(5)
entry.translation: #(1) dan #(2) tidak mempunyai instan yang sama. #(3) | #(4) | #(5)

entry.string: You must enter a name.
This entry already exists.
You must enter a user name and a valid email address.
entry.translation: Anda harus memasukkan nama user dan alamat email yang benar.

entry.string: deleted
Show the Users in this Group
Delete this Group
Email the Users in this Group
Show the Privileges assigned to this Group
entry.translation: Tampilkan Hak Akses (Privilage) yang ditetapkan ke Grup ini

entry.string: Test this Groups's Privileges
subgroup
subgroups
user
users
Modify this Group
